text: Events from the year 1598 in France ==Incumbents== * Monarch - Henry IV ==Events== *April - signing of the Edict of Nantes. *2 May - Peace of Vervins ==Births== Louis Phélypeaux, seigneur de La Vrillière ===Full date missing=== *Louis Phélypeaux, seigneur de La Vrillière, politician (d. 1681) *Helene Boullé (d. 1684). *Michel Villedo, stonemason, advisor and architect (d. 1667). ==Deaths== ===Full date missing=== *Jean de Serres, historian (b. 1540) ==See also== ==References== Category:1590s in France
title: 1598 in France
